description.black-white:
The user hurls an electric orb
at the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the damage.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user hurls an electric orb
at the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the damage.
description.x-y:
The user hurls an electric orb
at the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the move’s power.

description.sword-shield:
The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The
faster the user is than the target, the greater the
move’s power.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's Speed compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User's Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target's Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target's Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target's Speed  |   150
effect.shortEffect: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.
